content: the court in monza issued a judgment ordering the dissolution of a real estate community between two parties the property in question is a 6600 sq m apartment with specific rooms the court declared the property to be divisible and ordered its sale through separate expropriation proceedings the costs of the litigation were to be paid by bank db spa the judgment originated from an expropriation procedure initiated by bank db spa the courtappointed expert estimated the value of the property as a result of the dissolution the defendants were granted exclusive ownership of their respective shares but the entire property must be sold the court will provide separate orders for the sale procedures the judgment is considered conclusive and subsequent operations will be carried out to implement the ruling the costs of the proceedings will be borne by bank db spa the court decided to dissolve the community and divide the property located in cm the property is a 6600 sq m apartment with specific rooms the court ordered the sale of the property through expropriation proceedings and determined that the litigation costs will be paid by bank db spa the decision was made on december 10 2015
